name: Fantasy Hunter
summary:
BECOME A HUNTER

Embrace yourself in Fantasy Hunter VR- hunting game to get the best experience of hunting in a fantasy world. You can dirt your hands with the latest diversity of guns. Load guns promptly and do not miss a single target.

AIM PERFECTLY

Keep your eye on your prey! Do not miss headshot for furious killing. You will enjoy Fantasy hunting game by shooting wild and fast-moving animals.

WATCH YOUR STEP

Be Alert! Dangerous and wild animals can hunt you from nowhere. Take your every step...
